content.query:
-- Use COPY to load text file with non-standard row delimiters
-- POLYBASE can't handle non-standard row delimiter

CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
    (
        [Date] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [NorthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [SouthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Europe] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Africa] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Asia] [int]  NOT NULL
    )
GO

-- Replace SUFFIX with the unique suffix for your resources
COPY INTO wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts
FROM 'https://asadatalakers6nlej.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/dailycounts.txt'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='.',
    ROWTERMINATOR=','
)
GO
